summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Harris Place, from Hinds Street to Horton Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and side sewers, together with the necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 8306 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
